Pre-Game Insights: Star Wars™ Night, Goya Latino Family Celebration, Independence Blue Cross Senior Stroll the Bases, and the final Citizens Businessperson’s Special of the regular season
USA Baseball Women’s National Team utility player Denae Benites will throw a ceremonial first pitch
Former NFL player Carl Nassib, founder and CEO of Rayze, will throw a ceremonial first pitch
Former Philadelphia 76ers player and head coach Doug Collins will throw a ceremonial first pitch
Miscellaneous Highlights: May the Force be with you on Monday, August 26, for Star Wars™ Night during the 6:40 p.m. game
La Vera will be offering its Famous Roast Pork Sandwich at Coca-Cola Corner (left field) for $15.99 plus tax or paired with a Coke Zero for $22.98 plus tax

Fans are invited to bid on team-issued and game-used autographed memorabilia signed by former and current players as part of the Phillies Charities, Inc. Online Auction on phillies.com/auctions until September 1 at 6:00 p.m.
Others: Gate Openings: 5:10 p.m. on Monday and Tuesday; 2:35 p.m. on Wednesday
NEW Phillies Live Audio: Fans at Citizens Bank Park can enjoy the Phillies 94 WIP radio broadcast in real time using the MLB Ballpark app
Mobile Ordering: Includes Manco & Manco @ Foundry Pizza, Miller Lite Liberty Landing, Pass and Stow and Shake Shack
Bag Policy: Guests are prohibited from bringing non-clear bags, including backpacks and drawstring bags, into the ballpark
Uber RideShare Lot: Lot T is designated for Uber RideShare for all Citizens Bank Park and Wells Fargo Center events
Parking: Parking for Phillies games is cashless. Methods of payment include credit/debit cards and mobile payment (Apple Pay, Google Pay)
Public Transportation: Transit services are also available; for a SEPTA schedule, please visit www.septa.org
Traffic: Log on to www.511pa.com, www.511nj.org or call 511 from any phone to check traffic conditions
